meta.title: AnaliseJUR - AI for Legal Document Analysis
meta.description: Intelligent legal document analysis system with AI, OCR and machine learning for law firms
meta.keywords: legal AI, document analysis, OCR, machine learning, law firm

analisejur.title: AnaliseJUR
analisejur.subtitle: Complete intelligent judicial document analysis platform that transforms PDF processes into structured and actionable data, combining advanced OCR with multiple AI providers for legal automation.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Law Firm?
cta.description: Start today with our 30-day free trial. No commitment, no credit card required.

hero.title: Main Features
hero.description: Complete platform that executes ingestion, processing, analysis and visualization cycle of legal data with robust backend pipeline and modern web interface.

features.title: Deep PDF Extraction
features.description: Uses docling library to extract complete text, images, tables and metadata from judicial documents with precision.

features.title: Automatic Organization
features.description: Automatically identifies case numbers and creates standardized folder structure for organized storage.

features.title: Multiple AI Providers
features.description: Integration with Google Gemini, OpenAI ChatGPT and Anthropic Claude for specialized legal analysis.

features.title: Intelligent Chat Interface
features.description: Natural language interaction for questions, summaries, analysis and comparison of specific documents.

features.title: GPU Acceleration
features.description: Automatically detects NVIDIA GPU with CUDA to accelerate processing, with CPU fallback.

features.title: Flexible Configuration
features.description: Web interface to configure API keys and choose AI models according to user needs.

benefits.title: Proven Results
benefits.description: System that transforms judicial documents into structured and actionable data, optimizing legal workflows with advanced technology.

steps.title: Ingestion
steps.description: Upload PDFs to docs_analisar folder for automatic processing

steps.title: Processing
steps.description: Data extraction, case identification and structured organization

steps.title: Analysis
steps.description: AI chat interface for intelligent queries and comparisons

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: See how AnaliseJUR is transforming law firms across the country.

items.name: Dr. Carlos Mendes
items.role: Partner at Mendes & Associates Law Firm
items.comment: AnaliseJUR revolutionized our practice. We can analyze twice as many cases in the same time.

items.name: Dr. Ana Paula Silva
items.comment: Automatic draft generation saves me hours of work. Exceptional quality!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get your questions answered about AnaliseJUR.

items.question: How does document processing work?
items.answer: The system uses the docling library to extract content from PDFs, automatically identifies case numbers and organizes data in standardized structures with JSONs, Markdowns and images.

items.question: Which AI providers are supported?
items.answer: AnaliseJUR integrates with Google Gemini, OpenAI ChatGPT and Anthropic Claude, allowing you to choose the most suitable model for each type of legal analysis.

items.question: Is GPU required to use the system?
items.answer: It is not mandatory. The system automatically detects NVIDIA GPUs with CUDA to accelerate processing, but works perfectly with CPU when GPU is not available.

items.question: How does document comparison work?
items.answer: Through the chat interface, you can request specific comparisons between documents from the same case. The system filters relevant content and generates detailed comparative analysis.

meta.title: FitCoach - Personal Trainer App
meta.description: Complete app for personal trainers to manage workouts, clients and progress
meta.keywords: personal trainer, fitness app, workout management, clients

fitcoach.title: FitCoach
fitcoach.subtitle: Modern web application (SPA) developed in React/TypeScript that connects personal trainers and students through a centralized platform for complete fitness activity management.

cta.title: Get Started Today
cta.description: Join hundreds of personal trainers who have already transformed their businesses with FitCoach.

hero.title: Advanced Technical Architecture
hero.description: Single Page Application (SPA) built with React/TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS and Supabase for maximum performance and scalability.

features.title: Complete Student Management
features.description: Robust system for registration, monitoring and student management with custom hooks (useStudents) and intuitive interface.

features.title: Smart Diet Plans
features.description: Creation and management of meal plans with dedicated hook (useDietPlans) and specialized nutrition components.

features.title: Session Scheduling
features.description: Complete scheduling system with useSessions hook, interactive dialogs and real-time schedule management.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: Robust authentication system with Supabase, route protection and user session management.

features.title: Specialized Dashboards
features.description: Dedicated panels for administrators, trainers and students with real-time metrics and detailed reports.

features.title: Modern Interface
features.description: UI/UX developed with Shadcn/UI and Tailwind CSS, ensuring responsiveness and premium experience on all devices.

architecture.title: Architecture and Organization
architecture.description: Modular and scalable structure that facilitates code development and maintenance.

items.title: üìÅ components/ui/
items.description: Reusable base components from Shadcn/UI (Button, Card, Input, etc.)

items.title: üìÅ components/auth/
items.description: Authentication system with route protection and session management

items.title: useStudents.ts
items.description: Manages state and logic for student data manipulation

items.title: useDietPlans.ts
items.description: Centralizes the complexity of diet plan management

items.title: Authentication
items.description: Secure login and registration system with session management

items.title: Database
items.description: PostgreSQL with versioned migrations and TypeScript types

items.title: Real-time APIs
items.description: Automatic data synchronization between client and server

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.description: Modern and reliable technologies that ensure performance, security and ease of maintenance.

testimonials.title: User Testimonials
testimonials.description: See what personal trainers are saying about their experience with FitCoach.

items.comment: FitCoach revolutionized the way I work! I can manage 60 students with ease and they love the personalized tracking.

items.name: Marina Oliveira
items.comment: The platform is intuitive and complete. My students can track their progress in real time and this has greatly increased their motivation!

ondemand.title: OnDemand
